pullRequest.title: Remove project usages in internal tasks for better configuration cache support
pullRequest.bodyText:
This brings us closer to be compliant with the gradle configuration cache feature
(see #57918)
All internal tasks used during precommit should now be free of invalid project references

nodes.bodyText: Should we be using these "managed" properties more often?
Why not use a DirectoryProperty here?
Where did we land on using method injection vs constructor injection? Should we standardize on one vs the other?

- This brings us closer to be compliant with the gradle configuration cache feature

Only track path to rootDir not all content

- configurations are not serializable so we ported it to FileCollection which is enough
